root: ^I bestow upon you, our noble warrior, a solemn task: rid our island of the goblin scourge once and for all. Lead us to reclaim every corner of our beloved home.
^To reclaim our island, you must venture forth and conquer the four dungeons scattered across its expanse. Each holds a key to our liberation, restoring peace to our cherished lands.
^May your courage guide you, and may each swing of your blade bring us closer to lasting peace.
